getting_started.title: Getting Started
getting_started.content: Set up your portfolio, language, and optional API keys to start tracking your investments.
getting_started.details:
1. Create a new portfolio or import a CSV/PDF from your broker
2. Set language and base currency in Settings > General
3. Add your Gemini API key in Settings > AI Settings to enable Analysis and AI Chat
4. *(Optional)* Add your EODHD API key in Settings > EODHD for real-time portfolio quotes
5. *(Optional)* Add your FMP API key in Settings > AI Settings as an alternative for market quotes
6. Explore Portfolio, Market, and Goals tabs — Market top movers work without any key!
7. Refresh data after important trades

**How market data works:**
- Top 20 gainers/losers for 10 global markets are updated daily via a free serverless feed (no key needed)
- Portfolio position prices: EODHD key (real-time) → FMP key → daily snapshot

**Tips:**
- Keep one base currency per portfolio
- Verify tickers before importing
- Use the ? button to reopen this guide

importing.title: Importing Data
importing.content: Instructions for importing CSV/PDF files from supported brokers.
importing.details:
**Interactive Brokers (IBKR)**
1. Log in to Client Portal
2. Go to Performance & Reports > Statements
3. Select "Flex Queries"
4. Create or run an Activity Flex Query
5. Download the report as CSV or PDF

**Other brokers**
Export your positions or statements as CSV/PDF, then use "Import Portfolio" and choose the broker.
If your broker is not listed, use "Other (Generic CSV)" and follow the column format shown on screen.

**Troubleshooting:**
- Check decimal separators for your locale
- Remove empty header rows
- Ensure symbols, quantities, and prices are present

analysis.title: Understanding Analysis & Market Data
analysis.content: Learn how AI insights and market data work.
analysis.details:
Portfolio Manager uses Gemini AI for portfolio insights and AI chat. Market top movers are provided by a free daily serverless snapshot — no key needed.

**To enable AI Analysis:**
1. Get a free Gemini API key from Google AI Studio
2. Paste it in Settings > AI Settings
3. Use the Analysis tab to generate reports or chat

**Market data (top movers — no key needed):**
- Updated daily via GitHub Actions + EODHD bulk data
- 20 top gainers and losers per market for Today / Week / Month / Year
- 10 global markets: US, UK, Germany, France, Italy, Canada, Japan, HK, Australia, India

**Real-time portfolio prices (optional):**
- Add your EODHD API key in Settings > EODHD for real-time quotes
- Or add your FMP API key as an alternative
- Without a key, the app uses the latest daily snapshot prices

**Key metrics:**
- Sharpe Ratio, Volatility, Beta, Alpha, Max Drawdown
- Allocation and risk breakdowns

goals.title: Setting Goals
goals.content: Set goals, contributions, and track progress over time.
goals.details:
1. Tap "Goals" in the bottom navigation
2. Tap "Add Goal" and choose a goal type
3. Set target amount, date, and optional monthly contribution
4. Use target allocation to compare with portfolio mix
5. Sync with your portfolio to keep progress updated

rebalancing.title: Rebalancing Positions
rebalancing.content: How to set target weights, use quick actions, and save a rebalance plan.
rebalancing.details:
Use the Rebalancing tab to define your desired portfolio mix.

**How it works**
- The app starts from your current allocation.
- Edit each **Target** value to set your desired weight.
- **Delta** shows what to add or reduce for each position.

**Quick actions**
- **Reset to current allocation**: fills targets with current weights.
- **Distribute equally**: assigns the same target percentage to every position.
- **Changes only**: shows only positions where target and current differ.

**Before saving**
- Keep the total target at 100%.
- Save when the summary card confirms the allocation is valid.

market_data.title: Market Data & Snapshots
market_data.content: How market data is delivered without requiring an API key.
market_data.details:
**Serverless Market Snapshot**
Every weekday after US market close, an automated pipeline downloads EODHD bulk data for 10 global exchanges, computes the top 20 gainers and losers for 4 timeframes, and publishes the results to GitHub Pages.

**No key required for movers:**
The Market tab fetches top movers data automatically from the public snapshot URL. All users see the same market data without any configuration.

**Optional EODHD API key:**
Add your own EODHD key in Settings > EODHD Market Data to get real-time quotes for your portfolio positions.

**Optional FMP API key:**
Alternatively, add an FMP key in Settings > AI Settings as a fallback for portfolio quotes.

**Historical data:**
The pipeline maintains a history database that enables weekly, monthly, and yearly top mover rankings based on real price change calculations.

glossary.title: Investment Glossary
glossary.content: Definitions of the main terms used in the app.
glossary.details:
**P&L**: Profit and loss (current value minus cost basis)

**Cost Basis**: Original purchase price

**Allocation**: Weight of an asset within the portfolio

**Volatility**: Price fluctuation over time

**Drawdown**: Peak-to-trough decline

**Base Currency**: Primary reporting currency

charts.title: Portfolio Charts
charts.content: How to read treemaps and allocation tooltips.
charts.details:
**Positions Treemap**
Each rectangle represents a position; size shows weight on total value. Tap or hover for allocation and value.

**Geographic Treemap**
Positions are grouped by region (US, Europe, Asia, Rest of World, Liquidity, Commodities, Unassigned).

**Tips:**
- Large blocks indicate concentration risk
- Update your portfolio after trades to keep charts accurate
